content: The title of what iconic Beatles song was inspired by a drawing made by John Lennon's son Julian?

I believe the song you're referring to is "Lucy in the Sky with Diamonds." The title was inspired by a drawing made by John Lennon's son Julian, which John interpreted as depicting Lucy (a classmate of Julian's) in the sky with diamonds. However, there was also speculation that the title was an acronym for LSD, which contributed to the song's notoriety.
